title: zeroknowledgeproofs
author: zeroknowledgeproofs
content: After what’s happened with Binance seems the future will lie in DEXs. CZ has already positioned himself so he can transition back end of Binance order books to DEXs. Order books will be launching soon on THORChain. writing on the wall can’t get much clearer than this:https://x.com/thejohalfiles/status/1727668879235723529
